address_line: K 108, Alexandria, Matruh Coastal Road, 51718 El Alamein, Egypt
name: CONA
property_description:
Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at CONCHA Beach Hotel, New Alamein

Prime Beachfront Location: CONCHA Beach Hotel in El Alamein offers a private beach area and direct beachfront access. Guests can relax on the terrace or enjoy sea views from their rooms. Comfortable Accommodations: Rooms feature air-conditioning, private bathrooms, and modern amenities such as mini-bars and TVs. Ground-floor units provide easy access to the beach and seating areas. Dining Experience: The hotel restaurant serves a continental and buffet breakfast, offering a variety of options to start the day. Convenient Services: The property provides a 24-hour front desk, housekeeping, full-day security, and room service. Free on-site private parking is available for guests. Nearby Attractions: Marassi Marina is 11 mi away, and Porto Marina lies 8.7 mi from the hotel. El Alamein International Airport is 32 mi distant.

Couples in particular like the location â€“ they rated it 9.7 for a two-person trip.
